questions.question: What is the fundamental characteristic of a laser beam?
Which of the following defines the beam divergence of a laser?

answers.a: The angle over which the laser beam spreads
answers.b: The power output of the laser
answers.d: The length of the laser cavity

questions.question: What is the SI unit for measuring the angle of divergence?
Why is a He-Ne laser commonly used in laboratory experiments?

answers.c: It has a stable output and emits visible light
answers.d: It has high power for cutting applications

questions.question: What component in a Michelson interferometer helps split the beam?
